title: SHADOW.
description:
After the events of Comic-Con, Build-A-Bear starts to realise that his freedom is over when an unexpected project arrives. To stop it, Build-A-Bear forms a team of people to take down the project, known as Project: Shadow.

**Releasing on YT August 15**

**Releasing on LPF+ August 27**

title: Beluga Gets Ready
description:
When Hecker is taken by an elite force security team, Beluga is once again given another curse to change into different forms. With this, he teams up with a random skilled vigilante to help get Hecker back.

**Releasing on YT October 17**

**Releasing on LPF+ November 1**

title: The Melon Sandbox Movie 2
description:
After the battle of the killers, Melon meets Corn, and soon finds out that Corn is friends with Apple, his original boss.

**Releasing on YT 2026**

**Releasing on LPF+ 2026**

title: The Talking Kitty Cat Movie
description:
When a dark version of Sylvester shows up from the future, Sylvester the talking kitty cat and his friends must stop Dark Sylvester from trying to alter the past.

**Releasing on YT 2025**

**Releasing on LPF+ 2025**

title: Evil Cat
description:
Evil Cat and his trusty worker, Dutsy are ambushed by the Devil Cat. When she threatens to take over and become the new leader of the Evil Kitty army, Evil Cat sets out to stop her before she takes the reign.

**Releasing on YT November 2025**

**Releasing on LPF+ November 2025**

title: Sanic Chase 2
description:
When Ant is returned back to Sanic Chase, he discovers that there are more versions of Sanic, to beat them, he assembles a team of fighters to take down each form.

**Releasing on YT October 31**

**Releasing on LPF+ November 15 **
